About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm; closed public holidays. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. No copying services available.

About.Access: Proof of identity required. Access to records only available by written request stating research topics granted in accordance with the provisions of the Local Government Act Ordinances.

About.Acquisition focus: Building applications, valuation books, rate books, history on public buildings and public lands, minute books. (80% in-house).
